pageContext.claim: “Those maniacs, AOC plus three...These people, they're maniacs who don't like our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was referring to Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY), who often goes by the nickname “AOC”, and three of her colleagues: Reps. Ayanna Pressley (D-Mass.), Ilhan Omar (D-Minn.) and Rashida Tlaib (D-Mich.). The four progressive congresswomen of color call themselves and their supporters “The Squad.” It's false to claim they "don't like our country."
